description:
Enter the dreams of a  forgotten memorie...

In the Enchanced Edition I fixed some level design and replacing the final level for a better place. whit effects, new textures for lo-fi lovers

Puzzle, artistic and indie. a game of 5 levels.

Explore darkness and sycodelic memories

strategy will be you company

Computer Specs :

  • Windows 7 64-bit or later
  • Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher
